column5: This 2-BR 2 BA water front resort is only available during Super Bowl week. It is located on Lake Conroe, 45 miles from the Super Bowl festivities in downtown Houston . Miniature golf, outdoor pool, indoor heated pool and jacuzzi. Game room, movie theater, horse back riding all available at this resort. It is fully stocked time share condo, with towels, kitchen appliances, plates, glasses and a washer and dryer in your condo room.
column8: Super Bowl Week - Waterfront Condo on Lake Conroe
